entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. 60 percent chance of drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
